item.title: WBA
item.description: score:70 Chances: Walgreens Boots Alliance named Employer of the Year by Disability:IN is a positive recognition for the company. The rollout of in-store vouchers, off-site vaccination clinics, and a combined flu and COVID-19 test reflects Walgreens’ efforts to offer convenient services. Positive consumer survey results indicating preference for local pharmacies can potentially benefit Walgreens’ business.
